IntroPage.title: Your Mobile Banking
IntroPage.description: Send & Receive money instantly. Pay for goods and services between BantuPay users.

AboutPage.title: About Bantu Pay
AboutPage.description: Bantu-Pay is a Mobile Banking app for consumers to transfer money instantly and maintain an E-wallet for their daily needs.
AboutPage.point1: Traditional banks in D.R. Congo don’t see a certain class of people as potential clients.
AboutPage.point2: Online money remittance platforms charge high fees, discouraging consumers.
AboutPage.point3: Receivers must travel to city centers to collect funds, adding transportation costs.
AboutPage.paragraph1: BantuPay is the solution—a mobile banking app facilitating instant money transfers for everyone in D.R. Congo and the diaspora.
AboutPage.paragraph2: It serves as an E-Wallet and payment system, enabling consumers to pay for goods and services (restaurants, online courses, boutiques, etc.) and deposit/withdraw money from local money agents.

FeaturesPage.feature6_description: Keep Track Of All Your Incomings & Outgoings
